name: Garden of Words: Japanese Audio with English Subtitles
detailed_description: When Takao decides to skip school one day in favor of sketching in a rainy garden, he has no idea how much his life will change when he encounters Yukino. Older, but perhaps not as much wiser, she seems adrift in the world. Despite the difference in their ages, they strike up an unusual relationship that always occur in the same garden on each rainy day. But the rainy season is coming to a close, and there are so many things still left unsaid and undone between them.

short_description: A chance encounter on a rainy day will forever alter the lives of two souls adrift in a world. With each storm the two grow closer, but will the distance between them remain the same?
